name: Pink Sugar Cupcake Soap
description:
Scent: Mouth watering Pink Sugar!
Handcrafted all natural glycerin soap. 
5 oz. Listing is for 1 soap. 

- Everyone seems to be crazy for cupcakes. And why not! This one is made with all natural glycerin soap and sure to bring a smile. Added jojoba beads in the icing for a gentle exfoliation. Gift bag and handmade tag included - makes the perfect birthday treat. This looks and is sized just like a real life cupcake.

- Have you tried Pink Sugar yet? Your going to adore it. Notes of cotton candy, caramel, lemon drops and raspberry all mixed together to bring you some pure delight.

SUNBASILGARDEN SOAPS:
Handcrafted happy soaps made to bring a chuckle and take care of your skin. Made with all natural, moisture rich glycerin. Detergent and sulfate free. We are also vegan friendly. 

SAVE EVERYDAY WITH COMBINED SHIPPING:
Mix and match any 4 -12 items and pay one low flat rate. 
See below for your location.

☆ ☆ $5.50 USA SHIPPING ☆ ☆ 

☆ $20.50 CANADA SHIPPING
☆ $24.50 INTERNATIONAL 

+ Shipping discount is refunded back to your PayPal or Credit Card +

name: Cookies and Milk Soap - Best Seller
description:
COOKIES AND MILK SOAP

Scent: Freshly baked Chocolate Chip Cookies
4 oz. Listing is for 1 soap.

- This is one of our best selling soaps here at Sunbasilgarden. It fits the bill for all ages. Makes an awesome unique gift too. Who doesn't love a good chocolate chip cookie. And best of all... 

Everything you see here is soap. We hand cut each cookie and milk and inlay it inside 3 layers of all natural, rich glycerin. The best part is the fun design will not rub away and lasts down to the very last scrub.

name: Blooming Tulips Soap
description:
Scent: Fresh Spring Tulips
My all time favorite flower and floral scent!
5.5 oz. Listing is for 1 soap.

- Did you know you could bottle up the scent of spring in a bar of soap? Well you sure can with Blooming Tulips. This scent is a perfect balance of floral and green notes so it's not overwhelming. Gorgeous pastels make up this shimmering beauty. Spot on as the English say!
